titleStmt.title: Dr. Oates's narrative of the Popish plot, vindicated in an answer to a scurrilous and treasonable libel, call'd, A vindication of the English Catholicks, from the pretended conspiracy against the life and government of His Sacred Majesty, &c. / by J.P., gent.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

notesStmt.note: "Humbly presented to both Houses of Parliament."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
